articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description: Robinhood will launch a Web3 wallet and plans to cover gas fees for users.
articles.title: Robinhood To Launch Non-Custodial Web3 Wallet The app plans to cover users' network fees.

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description: On May 16, Coinbase shared a wallet for its mobile app that lets customers access Ethereum-based dapps.
articles.title: Coinbase Rolls Out Ethereum Dapp Wallet

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description: Aurora+, a Near Protocol EVM platform, offers 50 free transactions a month, a staking interface, airdrops and NFTs.
articles.title: Aurora+ To Offer 50 Free Monthly Transactions and Airdrop For Early Users

articles.author: Aleksandar Gilbert
articles.description: “Legislation to regulate stablecoins, where used as a means of payment, will be part of the Financial Services and Markets Bill which was announced in the Queen’s Speech,” a spokesman for Her Majesty’s Treasury told The Telegraph.
articles.title: UK Proposes Regulations That Would Recognize Stablecoins As A Form Of Payment

articles.author: Jason Levin
articles.description: LFG burned through its Bitcoin reserves in an attempt to shore up UST. Some of its swaps are raising eyebrows.
articles.title: Luna Foundation Guard Spent $3B In Unsuccessful Bid To Defend UST Peg
